msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />Ooh, look! <20_2 arg="9" /> !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Having something like this outside totally spices up my island stroll!
<20_2 arg="10" />That <20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I get tired during my walk, or my coffee wears off, or whatever<20_3 arg="6" /> I can nap on it? Yaaaaay!

<20_2 arg="10" />What is a TV doing out here?<20_2 arg="9" /> So can I, like, watch it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ooh! We need to have a fab outdoor movie party! You bring popcorn, I'll bring my favorite movieCYBORG PRINCESS XIV: ETERNITY PINBALL!It's a really sweet romantic comedy!
<20_2 arg="10" />So that <20_2 arg="9" />means I can blast music, right?<20_3 arg="3" />Le awesome! New dance studio!

<20_2 arg="10" />Having a clock outside<20_2 arg="9" /> is so handy! Now I don't have to keep pulling out my phone!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Just wear a watch? Awatch? What year do you think this is? "Wear a watch"! HAHAHA!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!I went through a whole phase recently where I thought I'd decorate my house like a forest.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I was in kind of a weird place.
<20_2 arg="10" />So, um <20_2 arg="9" />What gives with the ?<20_3 arg="3" />Ooh! Is it for summertime tiny-pool parties?!<20_3 arg="6" />And in the winter, it can be, like, for tiny-hot-tub parties!
<20_2 arg="10" />Looks like we have right here <20_2 arg="9" />.And that's kind of weird, 'K?

<20_2 arg="10" /> in the middle of my usual stroll! <20_2 arg="9" />That is, wow, SO helpful! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can't tell you how often I'm out here being famous and need a break. This is great!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /> Is someone starting a band?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I call vocals! I'm singing!If you see the owner, pass that along, !
<20_2 arg="10" />!<20_2 arg="9" />Eating outside <20_3 arg="3" />would be MAX fun. <20_3 arg="6" />Snacking on food, talking to friends? Yeah!
Exercising outdoors is the best feeling EVER!And <20_2 arg="10" />that <20_2 arg="9" />looks like a<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> great way to do it!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? That's legit hardcore outdoorsy.<20_3 arg="6" /> <20_3 arg="3" />Is someone camping out here?
